column4: i guess if you have a desktop manager installed it launches from f7 and x then starts on f7?
i came here to ask a question about ubuntu, not ask someone to use google for me
will someone using a standar *ubuntu install please hit ctrl+alt+F1 and tell me what they see?  dont forget hitting ctrl+alt+F7 brings you back to X (gui)
that would take you to the first virtual console
